mapper.insert: insert into yuhan_student_report(homeworkNo, studentID, content, subjectID, selectClass) values(#{homeworkNo}, #{studentID}, #{content}, #{subjectID}, #{selectClass})
mapper.select: select count(content) from yuhan_student_report where homeworkNo = #{hwno} and studentID = #{studentID}

select no, member.memberName as name, member.memberHak as hak, date_format(date , "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as reportDate from yuhan_student_report as report, yuhanmember as member where homeworkNo = #{hwno} and report.studentID = member.memberID
select studentID from yuhan_student_report where no = #{no}
